title: bugsplat gave me queue timers
body: I got queue timers after bugsplatting at an internet cafe. Is there anyway to get this removed or is Riot just going to shaft me? Can't login to make a ticket it  keeps telling me the support site is down.

replies.body:
If you're consistently bugsplatting I'd try a different PC there, since there's likely something wrong with the installation or some background programs going on there. Unfortunately your leaves affect other people whatever the cause, and Riot can't fix issues occurring on your end.

If you only bugsplatted once and got a timer, then this isn't the first time you've left a game. You can leave (or dc from) a game quite a few times before you'll ever see a Leaver Buster timer unless you are doing it often, and again, you are affecting other players by doing so.
